title: New: Southern Shores – New Love
body:
Having impressed with their debut EP _**The Atlantic**_, Canadian duo **Southern Shores** are set to return with a new seven track release titled _**New World**_, out 2 October.

First cut to be taken from said EP is the luxuriously vibrant _New Love_, showcasing the eclectic range of influences that make up their sound. Check it out below (premiered via [XLR8R](http://www.xlr8r.com/mp3/2012/08/new-love)).
